p: The crude ethanolic extract, ethyl acetate fraction and methanolic fraction from fresh A. microcarpum bark had their intrinsic antibacterial activity evaluated displaying antibacterial activity at 512 Î¼g/mL ( E. coli, P. aeruginosa, and S. aureus), which when combined with antibiotics, potentiated the effect of amikacin and gentamicin against the strains ( 134).
